title: Inquisitor (v2.2.0.15) [GOG]
description:
Genre: Role-playing - Adventure - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English, czech
Features: single-player
Released: September 5, 2012
Size: 1.8 GB
Company: Cinemax / Cinemax
Installer version: v2.2.0.15
Included goodies: manual - Game Companion + 5 wallpapers + Armor and Weapons + Book of Magic + Codex Inquisitorium + soundtrack + 24 avatars + 68 artworks + Inquisitor the Novel + Revelation of Ezekiel + artbook + 6 localized extras (Czech)

About: 
Ultherst was once a peaceful, God-fearing land until the Three Scourges of God came to pass as foretold by Saint Ezekiel, one of the twelve followers of the First Prophet. First came the famine that devasted the populace. Next came the plague that added more unfortunate souls on Deathâ€™s abacus. Finally came the great rain of fire, and death fell down on sinner and innocent alike, blood flooding the streets in place of water. The people, in their desperation, turned away from the Holy Mother Church and delved deep into pagan decadence or succumbed to the temptation of the Devil. You have been charged with the office of Inquisitor. It is up to you to investigate crimes against the one true faith and root out heresy--using any and all means necessary. As in all best computer RPGs--the most important choices are yours to make
